price: Lalu mereka berkata, "Kepada Allahlah kami bertawakal! Ya Tuhan kami; janganlah Engkau jadikan kami sasaran fitnah bagi kaum yang  zalim,
arabic: فَقَالُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faqālū ʿalā al-lahi tawakkalnā rabbanā lā tajʿalnā fit'natan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
